layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 300x400
  LayoutSVGRoot {svg} at (0,0) size 300x400
    LayoutSVGHiddenContainer {defs} at (0,0) size 0x0
      LayoutSVGResourceLinearGradient {linearGradient} [id="gradient1"] [gradientUnits=userSpaceOnUse] [start=(0,0)] [end=(150,0)]
        LayoutSVGGradientStop {stop} [offset=0.00] [color=#FF0000]
        LayoutSVGGradientStop {stop} [offset=1.00] [color=#00FF00]
      LayoutSVGResourceLinearGradient {linearGradient} [id="gradient2"] [gradientUnits=userSpaceOnUse] [start=(0,0)] [end=(150,0)]
        LayoutSVGGradientStop {stop} [offset=0.00] [color=#FF0000]
        LayoutSVGGradientStop {stop} [offset=1.00] [color=#00FF00]
      LayoutSVGResourceRadialGradient {radialGradient} [id="gradient3"] [gradientUnits=userSpaceOnUse] [center=(150,264)] [focal=(150,264)] [radius=282.84] [focalRadius=0.00]
        LayoutSVGGradientStop {stop} [offset=0.00] [color=#00FF00]
        LayoutSVGGradientStop {stop} [offset=1.00] [color=#FF0000]
    LayoutSVGRect {rect} at (0,0) size 300x50 [fill={[type=LINEAR-GRADIENT] [id="gradient1"]}] [x=0.00] [y=0.00] [width=300.00] [height=50.00]
    LayoutSVGRect {rect} at (0,50) size 300x50 [fill={[type=LINEAR-GRADIENT] [id="gradient2"]}] [x=0.00] [y=50.00] [width=300.00] [height=50.00]
